participant_1.background:
I am still trying to lose weight.
my favorite dessert is cheesecake.
I work as an investment banker and enjoy flying kites on my days off.
I found a new way to escape the stress of work by playing music with my friends.
my favorite food is strawberries.

participant_2.background:
I'm a social media enthusiast looking to learn how to use it to grow my business.
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

content.text: Hi! It's going good, thanks. Just finished a big cake for a client.
Oh, wow! That's awesome. What kind of cake?
It's a chocolate cake with strawberry filling and cream cheese frosting.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! It's my favorite kind of cake.
I'm also trying to lose weight, so I'm trying to stay away from cake.
Oh, that's tough. I know how it is. I've been trying to lose weight too.
Yeah, it's hard. But we can do it!
Right! We just have to stay focused.
Exactly! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a social media manager for a small business.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What do you do for fun?
I like to watch foreign films, bake cakes, and play video games.
I love foreign films too! I don't bake much, but I love to play video games.
We should play video games together sometime!
That would be fun! I'll DM you my username.
